action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hi, thanks for coming. Today is the big day, we finally test the time machine! I'm so excited. [E]"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "Hi, thanks for coming. Today is the big day, we finally test the time machine! I'm so excited. [E]"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "As you know, normally you would try to investigate the truth of a certain historical event in the period and location we've decided. [E]"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "As you know, normally you would try to investigate the truth of a certain historical event in the period and location we've decided. [E]"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "But today we just calibrate the machine! So, you will go to the 5th of June 8B50 and take a newspaper with you when you come back. [E]"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "But today we just calibrate the machine! So, you will go to the 5th of June 8B50 and take a newspaper with you when you come back. [E]"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Try to take some notes of events you encounter, was that lab always been a lab as I think ? [E]"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "Try to take some notes of events you encounter, was that lab always been a lab as I think ? [E]"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "when you have finished the mission, join the extraction point. [E] "

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "when you have finished the mission, join the extraction point. [E] "

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Oh, I almost forgot to tell you, please don't modify the past, we're not sure of the consequences it can have."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "great, I... knew I coul. You could do it !"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "great, I... knew I coul. You could do it !"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "now that you're back, let's plan your real mission."

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "now that you're back, let's plan your real mission."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "you will be sent to the 25th of November 8B10, take the ''official history'' book related to this time and location."

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "you will be sent to the 25th of November 8B10, take the ''official history'' book related to this time and location."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "obviously, Since the Blue ones are in charge here, we don't have the REAL version of the story."

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "obviously, Since the Blue ones are in charge here, we don't have the REAL version of the story."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Your assigned task is to fact check the different points of the official Bleu book... ...."

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "Your assigned task is to fact check the different points of the official Bleu book... ...."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Yeah, we know that book is just a bunch of mombo jumbos, but Listen... I'm sure they've made terrible things !"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "Yeah, we know that book is just a bunch of mombo jumbos, but Listen... I'm sure they've made terrible things !"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "So use your NoteBook to bring back the truth !"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "So use your NoteBook to bring back the truth !"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "When you're done, come back and spread the truth among the poeple !"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "When you're done, come back and spread the truth among the poeple !"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "We are counting on you to repair the History ! Good luck."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You have to take back the Newspaper."
